techmeme.title: Teleperformance, the world's largest call center operator, rolls out AI tech by startup Sanas to soften English-speaking Indian workers' accents in real time (Benoit Berthelot/Bloomberg)
China replaces tech minister Jin Zhuanglong, a key figure in its push to become a tech superpower, with Li Lecheng; sources: Jin faced a graft-related probe (Financial Times)
Socure, a digital identity verification company, says bad actors are increasingly using social media selfies and generative AI to create more realistic fake ids (Julie Zhu/Bloomberg)
Spamhaus: Prospero, a notorious provider of abuse-friendly "bulletproof" hosting for cybercriminals, is routing its operations through Kaspersky Lab's networks (Brian Krebs/Krebs on Security)
Crypto reserve bills have failed in Montana, N. Dakota, S. Dakota, and Wyoming over the last month; Bitcoin Laws: such bills have been introduced in 24 states (Teresa Xie/Bloomberg)
